name: Distraction Machine
description:
Caught in the crossfire of warring cults in the midst of an undead apocalypse, a community of survivors perseveres through the power of music!

Welcome to Island City, a bustling metropolis that’s fallen prey to feeders, undead hordes who feast on the living. Government and its military have been wiped out leaving survivors to fend for themselves. The Children of Arms carve out their territory, mowing down the living and undead alike. The Purified seek to rid the world of feeders and humanity itself through fire. The Marauders wreak havoc, taking what they want and partying ‘til the end of it all. And the Quartier is one of too few fortified communities forced to endure the chaos. But this microcosm is exhausted, depressed, overwhelmingly on the brink of collapse. Its survivors could use a distraction.

You are The Distractor, the Pied Piper of the Undead, and the master of the Distraction Machine, a musical device cobbled together with bike parts & found objects that seems to control feeders. It also has the power to soothe, embolden or manipulate the living. The power and mystery of this machine can only be wielded by You.

Will your music save your people or lead them to ruin?

FEATURES


There are two major ways to play Distraction Machine - the story-driven Chronicle Mode and the open ended Conductor Mode for you to explore.

The apocalypse has destroyed the Old World. Survivors cling to hope, scavenging for supplies, and reclaiming territories full of resources. Each group survives in their own way resulting in turf wars with casualties swelling the feeders’ fetid ranks. Caught in the crossfire of warring cults, a community of survivors perseveres through the power of music. In Chronicle Mode, your choices and the music you create have the power to change people, their relationships to each other and how the community as a whole functions for better… or for worse.

  • Diverse cast of characters with a wide variety of wants, needs, and ambitions
  • 2.5D Animation - A comic book art style allows for the characters to pop out on the screen and contribute to the DIY aesthetic
  • Puzzles - Fulfill musical requests from NPCS in your community and beyond using a set number of instruments, themes, or music box configurations with creative puzzle solutions

In Conductor Mode, endless music creation with no narrative elements, allowing you create and share your music with friends.

  • Loop Library - A collection of music loops from drum beats, melodies and soundscapes you can mix and match give you the power to create complete original music easily
  • Playsheets - Grid assigned to each instrument where loops can be loaded to or individual notes can be placed.
Both modes will allow for sharing music and give you the opportunity to remix songs by your friends!

Other features:
  • A storyline that connects with the world from our Z'Isle comic series
  • Choices within dialog
  • Diverse roster of characters with full backstories to make them multidimensional
  • Unique cyclepunk aesthetic
  • Unlike most music games (that are rhythm based) musical composition is key to gameplay
  • Playable on Windows

Support needs?
Reach out to us on Twitter @Misc_Studios for questions, comments, concerns, or just to join our vibrant community! 😉

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS


  • OS: Windows 10
  • Hard Drive/Storage: 1 Gb of storage
